settings.title: Settings
settings.birthdayError: Please enter a valid date in dd.mm.yyyy format
settings.dataNote: Data is stored only on this device (localStorage).

specialNumberExplanations.palindrome: A palindrome reads the same forwards and backwards. This special number pattern creates a unique milestone worth celebrating!
specialNumberExplanations.repeating: This number contains a repeating pattern of digits. It's like a musical rhythm in numbers - perfectly structured and memorable.
specialNumberExplanations.sequential: Each pair of digits follows a sequential pattern. These numbers have a beautiful symmetry that makes them mathematically special.

explanations.birthday: Your annual birthday! A day to celebrate you and everything you've accomplished this past year. Take time to enjoy the day and surround yourself with those you love.
explanations.halfBirthday: Halfway to your next birthday! A perfect opportunity to reflect on the year so far and maybe treat yourself to something special.
explanations.quarterBirthday: A quarter of the way to your next birthday. These smaller milestones help us remember to celebrate life throughout the entire year.
explanations.daysUntilBirthday: Counting down to your special day! Use this time to plan something fun or just look forward to the celebration.
explanations.weeksOld: A round week milestone! These special numbers show how long you've been on Earth in weeks - an interesting way to think about age.
explanations.monthsOld: A round month milestone! Months are a nice way to measure age, especially in the early years when each month feels like a big change.
explanations.birthdayWeek: The whole week around your birthday is special! A full week of celebration and joy - perfect for extending the party beyond just one day.
explanations.birthdayMonth: The whole month around your birthday! A full month of birthday spirit - no reason to limit the celebration to just one day.
explanations.moveInAnniversary: Celebrate how long you've lived in this place! Your move-in date marks the beginning of a new chapter in your life.
explanations.halfMoveInAnniversary: Halfway to your next move-in anniversary. A nice opportunity to reflect on how your home has become yours.
explanations.quarterMoveInAnniversary: A quarter of the way to your next move-in anniversary. These milestones help us remember to appreciate our homes.
explanations.weeksSinceMoveIn: Round weeks since you moved in! These special numbers show how well you've settled into your new place.
explanations.monthsSinceMoveIn: Round months since moving in! Each month brings new memories and makes the place more your own.
explanations.starSignMonthStart: Your star sign month begins! Astrology can be fun to explore, and this is a great opportunity to learn more about your sign.
explanations.daysUntilStarSign: Counting down to your star sign month! An exciting time to explore astrology and maybe plan something special.
explanations.halfNameday: Halfway to your next nameday! Namedays are a traditional way to celebrate your name, and half-namedays give you an extra opportunity.
explanations.quarterNameday: A quarter of the way to your next nameday. These smaller milestones help us remember to celebrate our names throughout the year.
explanations.daysUntilNameday: Counting down to your nameday! Namedays are a lovely tradition that gives us an extra reason to celebrate.
explanations.christmas: Christmas is a time for family, joy, and traditions. One of the year's most magical days when we come together and celebrate love and togetherness.
explanations.daysUntilChristmas: Christmas is approaching! A time to look forward, plan gifts, and spend quality time with family and friends.
explanations.advent: Advent marks the preparation for Christmas. Each Sunday a new candle is lit, and we get closer to the big celebration.
explanations.daysUntilNewYear: New Year is approaching! A time for reflection on the year that has passed and excitement for what's to come.
explanations.halfYearMarker: Halfway through the year! A great opportunity to reflect on the first half of the year and plan for the rest.
explanations.newYear: The start of a new year! A time for new opportunities, resolutions, and hope. Perfect for setting goals and celebrating the future.

orientation.rotateMessage: Please rotate your phone to portrait orientation to use this app.
